listitem.para: All clusters that will be part of the &geo; cluster must be based on &productname; &productnumber;.
&slsreg; &productnumber; must be installed on all arbitrators.
The &hageo; add-on must be installed on all cluster nodes and on all arbitrators that will be part of the &geo; cluster.
The sites must be reachable on one UDP and TCP port per booth instance. That means any firewalls or IPsec tunnels in between must be configured accordingly.
Other setup decision may require to open more ports (for example, for DRBD or database replication).

All cluster nodes on all sites should synchronize to an NTP server outside the cluster. For more information, see the &admin; for &sls; &productnumber;, available at &suse-onlinedoc;. Refer to the chapter Time Synchronization with NTP.
If nodes are not synchronized, log files and cluster reports are very hard to analyze.
